text: Tolivirales is an order of RNA viruses which infect insects and plants. Member viruses have a postive-sense single-stranded RNA genome. The virions are non- enveloped, spherical, and have an icosahedral capsid. The name of the group is a portmanteau of "tombusvirus-like" and -virales which is the suffix for a virus order. ==Taxonomy== The following families are recognized: *Carmotetraviridae *Luteoviridae *Tombusviridae ==References== Category:Viruses
title: Tolivirales
